name: error
description: This event is called when an error occurs

name: linkedChapterStarted
description: Triggered when a specific chapter starts playing

name: linkedChaptersLoaded
description: Triggered when chapters are loaded for a track

name: linkedDebug
description: Triggered for various debug logs and errors

name: linkedLyricsFound
description: Triggered when lyrics for a track are found

name: linkedLyricsLine
description: Triggered when a new lyrics line is received

name: linkedLyricsNotFound
description: Triggered when lyrics for a track are not found

name: linkedPlayerCreate
description: This event is called when a player is created

name: linkedPlayerDeafChange
description: This event is called when a player deaf state changes

name: linkedPlayerDestroy
description: This event is called when a player is destroyed

name: linkedPlayerDisconnect
description: This event is called when a player disconnects

name: linkedPlayerMove
description: This event is called when a player moves

name: linkedPlayerMuteChange
description: This event is called when a player mute state changes

name: linkedPlayerQueueEmptyCancel
description: This event is called when the queue empty handler is cancelled (e.g., a new track was added)

name: linkedPlayerQueueEmptyEnd
description: This event is called when the queue empty handler finishes and destroys the player

name: linkedPlayerQueueEmptyStart
description: This event is called when the queue empty handler starts (the timeout)

name: linkedPlayerSocketClosed
description: This event is called when a player socket is closed

name: linkedPlayerSuppressChange
description: This event is called when a player suppress state changes

name: linkedPlayerUpdate
description: This event is called when a player is updated

name: linkedPlayerVoiceJoin
description: This event is called when a user joins the player voice channel while there is a player

name: linkedPlayerVoiceLeave
description: This event is called when a user leaves (or switches away from) the player voice channel while there is a player

name: linkedQueueEnd
description: Triggered when the queue ends

name: linkedSegmentSkipped
description: Triggered when a specific segment is skipped

name: linkedSegmentsLoaded
description: Triggered when segments are loaded for a track

name: linkedTrackEnd
description: Triggered when a track finishes playing

name: linkedTrackError
description: Triggered when an error occurs during track playback

name: linkedTrackStart
description: Triggered when a track starts playing

name: linkedTrackStuck
description: Triggered when a track gets stuck (e.g., playback halts)
